main.name: Brian Dennis
main.description: I am a self-taught web developer with a passion for learning and advancements in the evolvement of education. I am looking to use and develop my skills in efficient coordination, organization, and quick decision making to meet deadlines in a team environment as a full stack developer.
main.bio: I am a proud parent of three wonderful kids and happily married first and foremost. I love web development, it is more than a career or job to me it is my hobby I love creating things with my fingertips. However, my biggest enjoyment with web development would have to be javascript I love the robustness of it, I love the fact that it's full potential still has yet to be reached. Besides web development I love camping, kayaking, hiking, riding bikes also enjoy spending quality time with my family.

education.degree: B.S. Information Technology w/concentration in Web Development

work.title: Emergency Medical Technician
work.description: Emergency Medical Technicians-Basic (EMT-B) respond to emergency calls to provide efficient and immediate care to the critically ill and injured, and to transport the patient to a medical facility. After receiving the call from the dispatcher, the EMT-B drives the ambulance to address or location given, using the most expeditious route, depending on traffic and weather conditions. The EMT-B must observe traffic ordinances and regulations concerning emergency vehicle operation.

work.title: Junior Web Developer
work.description: As a Junior PHP Developer it was up to the development department to maintain the web applications for LaunchedIT's customer base which is a variety of clients.

projects.title: Movie App
projects.description: In this project I wrote server-side code to store a list of my favorite movies, including box art imagery and a movie trailer URL. I then used my code to generate a static web page allowing visitors to browse movies and watch the trailers.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: This project I made with React and HTML5/CSS3, Nodejs. The cool thing about this project is you only need to change the data in one file rather then searching for the data in multiple files.

projects.title: Book Finder
projects.description: Another project written in React but in this project I utilized the Google Books API.

testimonials.text: Brian is a consistently reliable and productive team member, that always brings his best work to the job. He is prepared to face challenges and to use them as positive experiences. He is ambitious and creative, and always willing to contribute ideas. He is also quick to take action and keeps up in a fast-paced environment without sacrificing the quality of his work. I enjoyed working with Brian because I knew I could depend on him to complete his own individual tasks, help others, and have a positive attitude.

In the time I worked with Brian he showed himself as a forward thinker with strong work drive and a limitless desire to learn more. His actions in the workplace and his excellent punctuality made him a very step above the rest employee. Brian would make an excellent asset to any company that would employ him.
